title: FontLab Studio â€“ trouble with generating otfs!
content:
hello everyone,

has anyone had this problem with FontLab Studio where .otf's can't be generated? this error message appears

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203175559im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture_5408.png)

please help

thanks!  
agata
author: Agata_Wycichowska

comments.content:
Agata,

there seems to be a problem in your OpenType panel. Please zip your .vfb file and attach it to the problem report at [http://www.fontlab.com/support/problem/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203175559/http:/www.fontlab.com/support/problem/ "http://www.fontlab.com/support/problem/")

Cheers,  
Adam

oh that sounds serious  
thanks adam!!
